content.prompt: How does the new normal force exerted on the crate compare to FN ?

choices.label: The new normal force is greater than FN.
The new normal force is less than FN.
The new normal force is equal to FN.
The new normal force is greater or less than FN depending on the value of Î¸.

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
